review: Wow! Amazing. Should have gotten this long ago. Easy to set up right out of the box. Love, love, love it!!!! If you are on the fence....you should get it!!!!
author: TDW

review: It's great, Wish I had purchased it sooner.
author: Emy

review: I had to buy a stronger router/modem but after that no problems. I love watching entire series and new shows that are on TV today can be watched the very next night!
author: Pattie R. Deville "MiMi"

review: Its great!  Netflix and Amazon prime videos view perfectly.
author: jackieb

review: My husband and I travel for our work, so this is the perfect thing for us!  I had no trouble connecting to the motel wifi, and it worked great.  Love it!
author: Bluebird "Railroad Gal"

review: Drops the signal constantly - and no, it is not a problem with my internet.  Just never worked as I had hoped it would.  Now using a different device to access streaming video.
author: B. Bates

review: Remote is not workingWhich means the entire product is not working
author: Louis

review: Cannot get it to accept my wi-fi code and it is only 18" from router. I even attached the Wi-Fi extender.
author: Lee

review: Easy to set up and use
author: Pappy
